titleStmt.title: Articles accorded for the truce generall in France. Faythfully translated out of the French coppy; printed by Fredericke Morel: ordinarye printer to the King
titleStmt.author: France. Sovereign (1589-1610 : Henry IV)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Wolfe for Andrew White, and are to be solde at the signe of the Gunne, at the little North doore of Paules,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 11257 on UMI microfilm, reel 567.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library (same copy filmed twice).
Appears at reel 567 #8, and at reel 839 #5 (British Library copy, filmed twice).

place.placeName: the signe of the Gunne, at the little North doore of Paules
